reviews.review_text: This restaurant is an absolute gem.! The food was fresh and flavourful. The service experience was on point. The ambiance was warm and inviting. Perfect for casual outings and special occasions. Highly recommend.

"The perfect place to experience the authentic flavors of Goa! The food was a delightful blend of spices and freshness, with the seafood being a standout. The ambiance truly captures the laid-back coastal vibe, and the staff was warm and attentive. Highly recommend the prawn curry absolutely delicious!"

A very mixed review to be honest. I personally like their taste but the people who come with me never do. Also we tried a lot of other dishes but the orders came in so late that we just dug into our food and did not click pictures of them. One more thing the last time we went it was an anonymous decision that for the quantity offered the rates a bit too much. But I guess that depends from season to season.
